title: about me
description: Hey! I am Evan Kosei Cook, an aspiring software engineer at Northeastern University, graduating May of 2025. Currently in my third year, I have immersed myself in a wide variety of courses and have taken a keen interest in full stack development. I have developed proficiency in languages like TypeScript, Python, Java, and C and am experienced in using tools like Git, Docker, and AWS. I am known for my eagerness to take on challenges and ability to quickly adapt to evolving project needs and circumstances. Feel free to connect with me on LinkedIn or at cook.ev@northeastern.edu!
